name: ecom_item_id
description: Item ID from Retailer's eCom system.

name: takeoff_item_ids
description: Array of item ID in TO system (tom-id). Each Item IDs should be mentioned once.

name: ecom_line_id
description: Uniquely identifies order-line. This is a nullable attribute. Value should be empty string in case such id is not supported in given implementation.

name: requested_quantity
description: Requested quantity of an item. Even for items that are sold by ea priced by lb, this is an int (count). Can be changed before cut-off time.

name: price_formatted
description: Current price of 1 pcs of product including all discounts.

name: unit_of_measure
description: Unit of measure. Used in picking-weight optional functionality only (unit, lb or kg).

name: value
description: Size of 1 pcs (see UnitOfMeasure) of a product.

name: fulfillment_location
description: Location where Line will be picked (MFC, Spoke, for example)

name: line_note
description: Note, provided by client to the Order
